attributes.action: Make it legal to show a  form of identification to make social media accounts
attributes.additional_details: Many athletes and general people are suffering online racial abuse for no reason at all and it’s time that it comes to a end , using identification to create social media will help crack down and find who these certain disgusting human beings are !
attributes.background: Make it legal to show identification for social media accounts to help decrease the amount of racial abuse online

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Make verified ID a requirement for opening a social media account.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598012
